ProjectTitle: Understanding the Processes Underlying Societal Threats using Novel Cluster-based Methods
InitialFeedbackHistory:
21/11/2023
Very good DMP
Using OSF is good, you can also consider transferring your data to RDR when ready to publish using the integration dashboard, you can find more information here: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/integration-dashboard
Under interoperable you can add if you use a codebook and/or standard vocabularies from your field (if needed)
label: good with suggestions
